about_the_game:
Number 6 in Studio Tokiwas ever-growing line of battle BGs, this pack contains nature backgrounds such as Volcanos and Deep Forests where the mightiest of boss battlers might be lurking. A heated and perilous boss battle right next to the Volcano or a sudden attack by a boss monster deep in the forest would spice up your battle scenes and add excitement to your games!

Enjoy flawless graphic images in your game by combining these BG graphics with other TOKIWA GRAPHICS series.

Features:

* "Volcano" themed battle BackGround (4 variations; day / sunset / night / rain)
* "Deep Forest" themed battle BackGround (4 variations; day / sunset / night / rain)
* Total of 8 BG images for your RPG Maker projects!
* These graphics are for RPG Maker use only!
